qas.question: What religions were practiced in the region from first centry CE to 4th centry CE?

answers.text: Buddhism, Nestorian Christianity, Zoroastrianism, and Manichaeism

qas.question: What tribes took control of the region in first centry CE?
When was Islam brought to the region?
What empire brought Islam practices with them?
Who brought Islam to the region in the early fourth century?
Central Africa continued its role as what?
Central Asia linked Canada, the steppes to the north and whom?
Who ruled the region until the 3rd century CE?

plausible_answers.text: Buddhism, Nestorian Christianity, Zoroastrianism, and Manichaeism

qas.question: Which religions were banned in the region?
